dmca.title: Perfect 10 DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
To abuse@depositfiles.com, copyright@visa.com, abuse@webazilla.com, 
DMCA-agent@google.com, AskDOJ.usdoj.gov


Dear Sirs,

Attached are the results of various searches that I performed on Google 
for listings involving the website depositfiles.com, and various 
obviously copyrighted materials, such as episodes of the TV series CSI 
Miami, Microsoft Windows 7 operating systems, Adobe Acrobat Professional 
Software, “The Beatles,” and “Elvis Presley,” as well as “cute young 
Lolita.”
Your companies should immediately require depositfiles to provide proof 
that it owns such materials. In the absence of such proof, your 
companies should not be aiding and abetting what appears to be massive 
criminal copyright infringement. Visa should not be processing credit 
cards and financially benefiting from this apparent illegal activity, 
webazilla should not be hosting such activity, and Google should not be 
linking to and benefiting from the traffic it receives by helping users 
locate stolen materials. Although I have not examined the links for 
“cute young Lolita” for obvious reasons, someone should also check to 
see if the Google links to depositfiles.com which offer materials 
relating to “cute young lolita gets her pussy stretched.” and “Awesome 
whore Jada Stevens got her mouth raped,” lead to illegal materials.

Sincerely,

[redacted], Ph.D.

310-476-0700
[redacted]
Beverly Hills, CA 90212
